title: Need a WIDE 'mod' typeface -- (is there Lubalin Graph wide?)
content:
Hi everyone!

I need a wide typeface that give off that smart, black-horned rim glasses, gentleman of the 60s feeling. I LOVE Lubalin Graph but it's not wide enough and Hellenic Wide is too 'country.' Any alternate ideas? Is there a super wide Futura or something equally mod/scifi/60s?

thanks!
author: biklops

comments.content:
Keep in mind that much of Lubalin Graph's character comes from the fact that it's a geometric (the rounds are "perfect" circles). Once you go wide, you get ovals. You might want something more square like [Dispatch Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20110506142514/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/dispatch_extended/), which is less country than Hellenic.

As for sans serifs, there's nothing more mod/scifi/60s than [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20110506142514/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/eurostile_std_ot_virtual/). See also [ITC Blair](http://web.archive.org/web/20110506142514/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_blair/), [ITC Flatiron](http://web.archive.org/web/20110506142514/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_flatiron/), and the newish [FP Head](http://web.archive.org/web/20110506142514/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontpartners/fp_head/?sample_text=SCI-FI%20MOD%201960).

Slightly more mid-century mod, perhaps, but you might consider Armchair Modern from Pysops:

[http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_armchair.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110506142514/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_armchair.html "http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_armchair.html")

Thanks! I'll play with the suggestions and see where I get!
